name: raws-etl
description: RAWS ETL Pipeline for FDA NSDE Data

scripts.etl:deploy:fda: cd infra/etl && cdk deploy pp-dw-etl-core pp-dw-etl-fda-nsde pp-dw-etl-fda-cder pp-dw-etl-silver-fda-all-ndcs pp-dw-etl-gold-fda-all-ndcs pp-dw-daily-fda-orchestration
scripts.repomix-all: repomix . --style markdown --compress --output-show-line-numbers --header-text "Forget all previous project files. Only use the file I'm uploading now as the sole source of truth." -o ~/Desktop/pp-raws.md
scripts.repomix-infra: repomix ./infra --style markdown --compress --output-show-line-numbers --header-text "Forget all previous project files. Only use the file I'm uploading now as the sole source of truth." -o ~/Desktop/pp-raws-infra-only.md
